TopicTitle: How to post an IMGUR album

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I just got done launching my delta II replica for another part of the forum. I took a lot of pictures and don't want to try and create a spoiler for it. I have seen people do it but I have yet to figure it out myself. 

Thanks,

Im The One

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T23:40:03Z" title="05/10/2015 11:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by Im The One**
Yay for being one of the first hits on Google and the link being broken. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif ":mad:")
Moving to Kerbal Network, since this is about the forum rather than the game itself.

> 
> 
> 19 minutes ago, Sharpy said:
> 
> 
> Yay for being one of the first hits on Google and the link being broken. ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif ":mad:")
> 

1. Date of thread
2. Forum update in November 2015 changed everything (links and ways to post albums), so not applicable anyway
3. Posting Imgur albums is currently impossible because of a recent update

I cant even post single images from Imgur.. What gives??

NVM pasting a direct link, the one that ends with .png seems to work.
Since Imgur seems to be in a state of flux these days and it's not clear whether album linking is even possible at this time, this thread will be closed until the matter sorts itself out.
